extName.description: The name of the extension shown in the web store and toolbar.

extDesc.message: A local-first extension to organize, tag, and backup your Gemini chat sessions into folders.
extDesc.description: The extension description shown in the web store.

extension_init_log.description: Console log message when the extension initializes.

context_invalidated_log.description: Console log message when the context is invalidated.

close_btn_title.description: Tooltip for the close panel button.

maktaba_library_title.description: Main header title of the extension panel.

back_btn_label.description: Label for the back button in settings.

download_backup_btn.description: Button to export data as JSON.

export_data_label.description: Section header for data export options.

export_csv_btn.description: Button to export data as CSV.

copy_md_btn.description: Button to copy data as Markdown.

storage_health_label.description: Section header for storage quota visualization.

calculating_text.description: Temporary text shown while storage usage is calculated.

archive_unlinked_btn.description: Button to move unlinked chats to a folder.

search_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input field.

search_syntax_title.description: Tooltip for the search help button.

help_row_term.description: Help row for basic text search.

help_row_include_phrase.description: Help row for exact phrase inclusion.

help_row_exclude_phrase.description: Help row for exact phrase exclusion.

new_root_folder_btn.description: Button to create a new top-level folder.

loading_state_text.description: Text shown while data is being retrieved.

quick_save_btn.description: Button to open the quick save menu.

quick_save_header.description: Header for the quick save menu.

tags_input_placeholder.description: Placeholder for the tags input field.

note_input_placeholder.description: Placeholder for the annotation input field.

confirm_overwrite_backup.message: This will overwrite your current folders. Are you sure?
confirm_overwrite_backup.description: Alert confirming data overwrite during import.

invalid_backup_format.description: Error alert for bad JSON structure.

json_parse_error.description: Error alert when JSON cannot be parsed.

csv_header_row.description: Header row for the exported CSV file.

md_export_header.description: Title/Header for the exported Markdown content.

copy_success_msg.description: Temporary text on button after successful copy.

pinned_searches_header.description: Header for the pinned searches section.

empty_folders_msg.description: Message shown when the folder list is empty.

diagnostic_unknown_offset.description: Used as a fallback when for the timezone offset when unknown.

unpin_btn.description: Name of button to unpin a search.

unpin_confirm.description: Confirmation to remove a pinned search.

symlink_menu_header.description: Header for the multi-location context menu.

empty_search_results.description: Message shown when search returns zero results.

search_results_count.description: Header showing number of search matches.

pin_search_btn.description: Button to pin the current search query.

pin_search_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the pin search button.

pin_exists_error.description: Alert when trying to pin a duplicate search.

pin_limit_error.message: Limit reached: Maximum 5 pinned searches allowed for optimal focus.
pin_limit_error.description: Alert when maximum pins are reached.

pin_name_prompt.description: Prompt asking user to name a pinned search.

new_subfolder_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the create subfolder button.

save_current_chat_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the add button on a folder.

add_link_tooltip.description: Tooltip for manually adding a link.

edit_note_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the edit note button.

move_folder_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the move folder button.

view_contents_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the open folder button.

multi_location_tooltip.message: This chat is in $COUNT$ folders. Click to manage.
multi_location_tooltip.description: Tooltip for chats that exist in multiple folders.

rename_chat_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the chat rename button.

edit_tags_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the edit tags button.

move_chat_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the move chat button.

remove_chat_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the remove chat button.

storage_full_alert.message:
‚ö†Ô∏è STORAGE FULL! ($USED$KB / 100KB)

Changes cannot be saved. Please delete old folders or prune unlinked chats to free up space.
storage_full_alert.description: Critical alert when Chrome sync storage is full.

save_error_alert.description: Alert displaying a generic save error.

context_invalidated_alert.message: Extension context invalidated. Please refresh the page.
context_invalidated_alert.description: Alert when the extension disconnects/updates in the background.

chat_id_error.message: Could not identify chat. Try refreshing the page.

chat_already_in_folder.message: This chat is already in this folder.
chat_already_in_folder.description: Alert preventing duplicate saves in the same folder.

already_saved_in_msg.description: Suffix for prompt showing where chat is currently saved.

folder_not_found_alert.description: Error alert when target folder is missing.

name_chat_prompt.description: Prompt asking for a chat title.

default_saved_link_title.description: Default title for manually added links.

tags_input_label.description: Label text in prompts for tags.

save_success_toast_multi.description: Toast message confirming save and listing other locations.

delete_folder_confirm.description: Confirmation prompt before deleting a folder.

rename_folder_prompt.description: Prompt to enter new folder name.

rename_chat_global_prompt.description: Prompt to enter new chat title.

global_delete_confirm.message:
Delete this chat globally from library?
It will be removed from: $FOLDERS$
global_delete_confirm.description: Confirmation for deleting a chat from all folders.

global_delete_simple_confirm.message: Delete this chat permanently from library?
global_delete_simple_confirm.description: Confirmation for global delete when no other folders exist.

last_folder_warning_confirm.message:
This is the last folder containing this chat.
Removing it here will permanently delete the chat and its notes from your library.

Are you sure?
last_folder_warning_confirm.description: Warning when removing a chat from its last remaining location.

untitled_chat_fallback.description: Fallback title if none is found.

new_root_folder_prompt.description: Prompt for new root folder name.

parent_folder_not_found_error.description: Error message when parent folder is missing.

back_tooltip.description: Tooltip for back button in folder view.

move_to_menu_header.description: Header for move chat context menu.

no_folders_available.description: Text when move menu has no targets.

move_folder_menu_header.description: Header for move folder context menu.

make_root_folder_action.description: Action item to move a folder to root.

no_targets_available.description: Text when move folder menu has no targets.

open_chat_first_alert.description: Alert when trying to quick save without an active chat.

saved_status_indicator.description: Indicator text next to folders in quick save menu.

prune_confirm.message: Found $COUNT$ unlinked chats (saved data not in any folder). Delete them to free up space?

system_clean_alert.message: System is clean. No unlinked chats found.
system_clean_alert.description: Alert when archiving finds nothing to archive or prune.

archive_confirm.message: Found $COUNT$ unlinked chats. Move them to a new 'Recovered' folder?
archive_confirm.description: Confirmation to move unlinked chats to a folder.

recovered_folder_name.description: Default name for the recovery folder.
